desc: This project is for 4 x 900 word crowdfunding campaign project descriptions and 4 x 20second max explainer/intro videos.It's in two parts.First the 4 x campaigns:I need the campaigns described and evocative images/infographics/graphic design and writing, rewards ideas and some flashy images.I need the four campaigns to launch at the same time with the spotlight link as my website: [url removed, login to view]My budget is around NZ$200 for the campaigns and $200 for the videos.So $400 total.First we do the campaigns:With an upfront milestone of NZ$100 and another $100 in 8 days.then we take a break before doing the videos.For the videos:I need the campaigns described and evocative images/infographics/graphic design and scriptwriting and performance - not necessary to have flashy effects just polished production values and short snappy videos (max 20 seconds each).make the content pop!This project is for 4 intro/explainer videos for 4 crowdfunding campaigns to launch at the same time with the spotlight link as my website: [url removed, login to view]My budget is around NZ$200 for the campaigns then around NZ$200 for these videos.With an upfront milestone of NZ$100 and the other NZ$100 in 8 days.Then we take a break for a few weeks before doing the videos.1. Mechanoidz Beta - a unity3d for steam fully-playable digital simulation of a four robot multi-game system (first version 2d in python, 2nd version along with 3d concept art which I'm developing and renders and schematics and a prototype in unity 3d) - stretch goal will include physical robotic version. I have a design brief and a projected budget.2. Before the apple versus microsoft war - a micro-budget feature movie shot on video. I have a projected budget and am working on the script. more info about my filmmaking experience via my website.3. A role-playing game collectable miniature tabletop war game about werewolves - set in an original world of my design - Escape from Drumdoll Village is about a group of poor werewolf shapeshifter magicians who are attempting to escape a prison city guarded by more powerful and battle hungry werewolves.4. My fourth KS campaign is about raising money to build additional functionality, features and a semi-social-network-like aspect to add to a fan website I'm developing for a cult techno-fantasy game that has been going for at least 13 years. The target for the kickstarter is $20k. The subject of the website is the Mutant Chronicles Universe. The functionality I want to build involves: a trading platform, player finder, perks for vips, and testimonials of members written by friends and fan content that people who have earned credits by voting on other people's fan content can submit. more info about the Mutant Chronicles Universe at the following links:[url removed, login to view] [url removed, login to view] [url removed, login to view] [url removed, login to view] [url removed, login to view] [url removed, login to view] [url removed, login to view] [url removed, login to view]

desc: Nuclear Power Plant / 3d Modelling / Illustration to include:1. Primary Core (in detail)This will show the central reactor vessel, steam generators, coolant pump, pressuriser and associated control lines etc within the concrete shield containment building. The top cooling tank will also be featured with adjoining fuel-handling area / building and main control room. The containment building will be cut away to show the internals.2. Turbine Island (in detail)This compound building will be cut away to feature the turbine generators, low and high pressure turbines and cells/tanks including linked tubing.3. Balance Plant (exterior only)This will be featured (external views only) as a range of linked auxiliary buildings close to the containment building and control room. This building structure will link the containment and compound building so that it looks like a complete 'working' plant.See attached sample illustration that I like, it needs to be better detail though. I have also included some basic illustrations of the containment building showing the reactor.On completion, all original files will be required. I will also need a couple of jpg renders including a very large jpg render for exhibition panels.You should have many years experience in 3d modeling and very confident in your ability to undertake this project. We would assume you will be using 3dMax or similar.Budget up to £250 in 14 days or less. No bids over this will be considered.
title: 3D Modelling / Illustration

desc: I am starting an interactive website dealing with the taboo subjects related to addiction caused to adverse childhood experiences (ACE). Validation Addiction is a real thing and I have suffered from it from my childhood. It has taken control over my life and has had corrosive consequences. Many others suffer from it and don't recognize it because they are caught in descriptives such as anxiety disorder, depression, suicidal tendencies, feelings of emptiness, alcoholism, drug addiction, sex addiction and many other mental health disorders. I want to begin a movement of compassion that can allow people to discuss these issues in a safe and open setting - vulnerability can be a strength and that's the message I want to convey through this launch video and future broadcasts. I need a videographer ONLY in the Washington DC or Sarasota, FL area.  ALL OTHERS - please DO NOT APPLY.  Thanks.
